body_html: The error messages I see are as early as configure script, unless we explicitly specify nccl locations, the configure script crashes and build fails. Currently, not sure how we resolve nccl location, but maybe @aaroey can weigh in.

body: The error messages I see are as early as configure script, unless we explicitly specify nccl locations, the configure script crashes and build fails. Currently, not sure how we resolve nccl location, but maybe @aaroey can weigh in.
